environments-yml:
- environment: "my-first-env"
  project-dir: "."
  url: "https://github.com"
  format-check-in-root-dir: false
  terraform-init-additional-dirs-yml:
    - "./main"
    - "./modules"
  goals-yml: [all, destroy-plan, destroy, apply-on-pr, destroy-plan-on-pr, destroy-on-pr]
- environment: "my-second-env"
  project-dir: "."
  url: "https://github.com"
- environment: "also an env"
  project-dir: "."
  url: "https://github.com"
  goals-yml: [init, format, validate, lint]
extra-envs-from-secrets-yml:
ARM_CLIENT_ID: ARM_CLIENT_ID_secret
ARM_SUBSCRIPTION_ID: ARM_SUBSCRIPTION_ID_secret
ARM_TENANT_ID: ARM_TENANT_ID_secret
TF_VAR_my_custom: TF_VAR_my_custom_secret
